name: Rome Life Hotel
description: Conveniently situated, Rome Life Hotel offers easy access to Rome's popular hot spots. This modern hotel is an ideal choice for exploring the local vineyards as it is located in the Latium Wine Region. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Rome Life Hotel, such as babysitting/child services, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Just moments from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. For guests' comfort, all rooms at Rome Life Hotel are both soundproofed and air conditioned. They provide tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Those staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a range of well-known eateries in the area to discover. Rome Life Hotel is within walking distance of Trevi Fountain, Colosseum and Roman Forum. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Rome.Revato

name: The First Roma Arte
description: This 5-star boutique hotel is in Rome's historic centre an 8-minute walk from the Spanish Steps. It offers a panoramic rooftop terrace, 24-hour personal assistance and room service and elegant rooms with free WiFi. The First Roma is a member of LVX Collection of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. It is a 2-minute walk from Richard Meyer Ara Pacis Museum, a 5-minute walk from Flaminio Metro Station and 750 metres from the Spanish Steps. Exclusive boutique shops on Via Condotti are 550 metres from the property. Rooms at The First Roma feature contemporary works of art and modern furniture. Each comes with iPod docks, soft bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some suites boast a terrace with hot tub. Guests can enjoy seafood at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant as well as the rooftop Acquaroof restaurant. A lobby bar and a free fitness area are also available on site.

name: Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & Restaurant
description: Just metres from Rome's Trevi Fountain, Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & Restaurant offers modern rooms and a restaurant. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, parquet floors, and a minibar. Some rooms include a seating area. The private bathroom has bathrobes, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. Barberini Metro is 550 metres form the property, while the Quirinale is 5 minutes' walk away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 20 km from Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & restaurant. The museum, La città dell'Acqua - Vicus Caprarius is 50 metres from the property.

name: Best Western Hotel Artdeco
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. The Best Western Hotel Artdeco is located in the city center, between Via Veneto and the train station. The hotel is connected to the air terminal via the Catro Pretorio subway stop. Some of the amenities enjoyed by guests include deco furnishings and a restaurant serving international and regional cuisine. Enjoy your stay. This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project. It undertakes to manage the hotel activities in a sustainable manner by monitoring consumptions, reducing the presence of disposable plastic, taking energy efficiency actions for a positive impact on the environment. **Restaurant temporarily closed**bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Isa
description: The Isa is a modern boutique hotel, completely non smoking. Located in the exclusive Prati district of Rome, it is a 15-minute walk from the Vatican along the banks of River Tiber. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi. Hotel Isa features elegant lounge areas, and breakfast is served on the panoramic rooftop terrace. Rooms are all air-conditioned and come with slippers and hairdryer. Each room and each floor features a different design and decor. The Pantheon and picturesque Piazza Navona are a short walk away, just across the river.

name: SuiteDreams
description: No description found

name: The Hive Hotel
description: Featuring a shared rooftop terrace, The Hive Hotel is 300 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica. The hotel provides free WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. All rooms at this property have a modern-style décor, and come with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with slippers, toiletries and a hairdryer, while some also include a seating area. An extensive sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is available daily. Guests can also find a bar and a restaurant serving Italian and Chinese cuisine. Domus Aurea is 1 km from the hotel, while Quirinale is a 20-minute walk away. Fiumicino International Airport is 30 km from The Hive.

name: Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
description: Perched on 15-acres of private Mediterranean parkland overlooking the Eternal City and the Vatican, the Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel offers 345 spacious guestrooms, 25 finely appointed Suites and the exclusive Imperial Club lounge. Dine at La Pergola, Rome’s first and only 3-star Michelin restaurant: peruse Europe's most prestigious private art collection, including an astonishing Tiepolo triptych and the 'Dollar Sign' series by Andy Warhol: or relax in the Rome Cavalieri Club, Rome’s most luxurious spa and fitness haven with one indoor and three beautiful outdoor pools. Completed by a large congress center able to accommodate up to 5,500 delegates, this luxury hotel is the only resort retreat in in the Eternal City, and brings new purpose to the fine art of exclusive hospitality.Hilton

name: Twentyone Hotel
description: The Twentyone is a modern boutique hotel on Via Cola di Rienzo, one of Rome's best shopping streets. Castel Sant'Angelo and the historic centre are just a pleasant 10-minute walk away. Rooms at the Twentyone Hotel are ultra modern and feature a minimalist décor. They offer an LCD satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and free WiFi. A continental buffet is available in a bright breakfast room. Open for lunch and dinner, the on-site restaurant serves traditional Roman and classic Italian dishes and a large selection of wines and champagne. The hotel is in the elegant Prati district, home to the Vatican and Saint Peter's Basilica, which are a 15-minute walk away. Lepanto Metro Station is 450 metres from the property, while bus links to Roma Termini Train Station are located close by.

name: Mama Shelter Roma
description: Mama Shelter Roma is your home away from home in the heart of Rome. Our neighbourhood hotel is nested a few steps away from the Vatican treasures. Whether you are here for work or play, local or just passing through the capital, Mama Roma will look afteryou. With cutting edge design elements, Mama Shelter Roma houses 217 bedrooms. With several private atelier style meeting rooms, bars and restaurants, a rooftop with a solarium, outdoor Garden Bar and a pool, Mama Roma will both spoil and inspire you.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Alpi
description: Boasting a spacious rooftop terrace, Hotel Alpi is an Art-Nouveau style property 5 minutes' walk from Termini Train Station. Castro Pretorio Metro Station is only 300 metres from the hotel. All rooms at the Alpi Hotel are individually decorated, in either a classic or modern design. Rooms feature a kettle and an interactive flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi. Breakfast is served in the dedicated room and guests can enjoy the use of a shared Illy coffe machine. Breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace on request. The Alpi has been owned by the same family since 1963, and the professional staff provide a personalised service. The Coliseum is only 2 metro stops, on line B, from Termini Station.

name: 47 Boutique Hotel
description: Boasting a panoramic rooftop restaurant, Fortyseven is in the historic centre of Rome, 350 metres from the Bocca della Verità sculpture. It features a gym, steam bath, and rooms with parquet floors. Air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Fortyseven include a satellite LCD TV with Netflix and Sky, safe, minibar and Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathroom has soft bathrobes, slippers, and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi is free throughout. A continental breakfast is served daily at the buffet, while creative Mediterranean cuisine is served at the restaurant, 47 Circus Roof Garden. Guests can enjoy a cocktail at the 47 Circus Roof Garden bar, open every day until midnight. Teatro Marcello is 300 metres away, while the Jewish Ghetto is reachable on foot in around 5 minutes.

name: Roma Luxus Hotel
description: Roma Luxus Hotel offers free WiFi and stylish rooms in Rome's Monti district. Set 300 metres from the Roman Forum, the property also features a bar and an à la carte restaurant. Rooms at the Luxus Hotel Roma are all spacious and come with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and air conditioning. Each room includes a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. An extensive sweet and savoury international buffet breakfast is available daily. It includes eggs, pancakes, cheese and pastries. The hotel is 400 metres from both Piazza Venezia and Quirinale Palace, while Via Nazionale shopping street can be reached in 1 minute on foot. Rome Ciampino Airport is 15 km away.

name: Relais Giulia
description: Featuring stuccoed walls and an ancient cloister, Relais Giulia offers elegant rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. It is a 5-minute walk from Campo de' Fiori Market and Piazza Navona Square. Designed by Italian architects Christian Rocchi and Danilo Maglio, rooms at the Giulia Relais come with ultra-modern furnishings, luxury fabrics and LCD TVs. They all include a private bathroom. The lively Trastevere district, with its cafés, restaurants and shops, is just a stroll away. The Trevi Fountain and Saint Peter's Square are both a pleasant 10-minute walk from the property.

name: Antico Albergo del Sole al Pantheon
description: Centrally located, Hotel Sole Al Pantheon offers easy access to Rome's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. This modern hotel is an ideal choice for discovering the local vineyards as it is situated in the Latium Wine Region. Hotel Sole Al Pantheon features a 24/7 reception, as well as free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. For added convenience, it offers limited hours room service, a safe and porters. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. Hotel Sole Al Pantheon provides 32 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a walk-in closet are also included. Enjoy a relaxing aperitif in the hotel's cosy lounge bar, before heading off to the restaurant for an evening meal. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood offers several bars and restaurants serving a range of varied cuisines. Rome's attractions, such as Trevi Fountain and Piazza Navona, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Sole Al Pantheon. It is within a short stroll from Pantheon.Revato

name: Comfort Hotel Bolivar
description: The Comfort Hotel Bolivar is situated within walking distance of the Colosseum and popular area attractions, including the Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps and the famous Via Veneto. The hotel is just minutes from the Termini railway station, the easiest way for connections to reach both the Ciampino and the Leonardo da Vinci Fiumicino Airport. Piazza Venezia, a famous city square, is right around the corner. A variety of restaurants and cocktail lounges are located in the surrounding area. Be sure to stop by the American-style bar at the hotel for a drink in the lobby. Guests can enjoy a free full breakfast every morning in a lovely breakfast room with a special view on the historical center. All guest rooms are equipped with new bathrooms, mini-bars, hair dryers, flat TVs, free WiFi, air conditioning and safes. Select rooms also have balconies. Non-smoking and handicap accessible rooms are available upon request. Private guest parking is located on the premises for convenience. This pet-friendly hotel also provides a currency exchange, car rental service and valet cleaning services. The Comfort Hotel Bolivar has a quiet and convenient location, which combined with its superior accommodations, helps make it the perfect place for all travelers to stay and visit the heart of Rome.Choice Hotels

name: Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton, set in the heart of the city. Once a bank headquarters, the hotel has been fully renovated while maintaining the authentic Cipollino marble and charming architecture. Walk to the Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and Villa Borghese, or shop the luxury Italian brands along the Trident streets. There’s a wealth of beautiful sites and museums nearby including the Colosseum, Roman Forum and Vatican Museum. Unwind in a guest room with modern Italian furniture, high ceilings, marble floors, and modern comforts like complimentary WiFi, an interactive TV, Nespresso® machine and walk-in shower. Suites offer a separate living area, bar cabinet and guest bathroom, plus welcome gifts and complimentary services. Choose the Barberini Suite for your own private terrace overlooking the rooftops of Rome. Enjoy gourmet cuisine throughout our restaurants and lounges. Restaurant 1930 serves creative local dishes including a lunch buffet, and Sky Blu on the rooftop has a genuine Italian setting. The Onyx Lobby Lounge and Bar is popular with guests and locals alike – try a signature Aleph cocktail – and our Cognac Lounge is a unique place in the city to enjoy your cigar and spirits. Book indulgent treatments in our spa, and relax in the indoor and rooftop pools. Plan events in stylish spaces that accommodate board meetings up to lavish weddings. Dedicated planners and the latest A/V technology ensure your event is a success. Hilton Honors program available.Hilton

name: Hotel Eden - Dorchester Collection
description: No description found

name: Palazzo Manfredi
description: Admire an outstanding view of the Coliseum over breakfast at the rooftop terrace at Hotel Palazzo Manfredi. Rooms here are spacious and offer free Wi-Fi and Sky TV. With such a central location, a 2-minute walk from Colosseo Metro Station, getting around Rome is easy. Some units has a view of the ancient ruins along the Roman Forum. Other room amenities include a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a minibar and pay-per-view channels. Palazzo Manfredi also offers a self-catering option. The apartments are located in the same historic area of Rome and feature living rooms and kitchenettes. Cocktails and light snacks can also be served out on the terrace. If you really want to see Rome in style, you can rent a Lamborghini sports car from reception.

name: Hotel Emona Aquaeductus
description: Hotel Emona Aquaeductus is a small villa with its own quiet garden set in central Rome, 500 metres from Manzoni Metro Station on line A. Buses for the Vatican and Termini Train Station run from Piazza di Porta Maggiore 50 metres away. Your room has air conditioning, a minibar, and a satellite TV. Bathrooms are in marble, and free Wi-Fi is provided. Some rooms have a spa bath. Emona Aquaeductus Hotel provides free daily newspapers and a laptop in the lobby. Breakfast may be served in the garden. The bar and reception are open 24 hours a day. Staff are multilingual and can assist you with tourist and travel info.

name: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's
description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's is on the historic Via Aurelia Antica, 5 km from the Vatican and very close to the lush Villa Pamphili Park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This Crowne Plaza is surrounded by its private park. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. The spa is free for all guests as well as the 2 tennis courts and the outdoor swimming pool, open during the summer and featuring a pool bar. There is also a free fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Rooms are spacious and come with modern furnishings. The buffet breakfast is American-style. The restaurant is open all day long and serves delicious, Italian cuisine. During summer meals are served on the terrace. There is also a business centre. Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's offers free parking. A scheduled transfer service to/from Rome Fiumicino Airport is arranged on request, at extra costs. Buses stop outside the hotel and there is a taxi station on site.

name: Hotel Relais dei Papi
description: Just 500 metres from Lepanto Metro Station on line A, Hotel Relais Dei Papi is 5 minutes’ walk from St. Peter's Square and the Vatican Museums. All air-conditioned, rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV. With excellent public transport links, Relais Dei Papi consists of 4 floors, and is 2 metro stops from the Spanish Steps and a 20-minute ride from the Coliseum. Rome's famous Cola di Rienzo shopping street is around the corner, and discounts are available at a garage just 50 metres away. A breakfast buffet including cereals, croissants and fruit juices is served daily in the breakfast room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. You can book an exclusive session at the on-site paid spa. The free gym is open at shceduled times during the day. Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer and toiletry set.

name: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George. The hotel boasts a privileged position for discovering the wonders of the Eternal City. 5-star luxury boutique hotel located in the enchanting Via Giulia, in the heart of the historic center of Rome, a few steps from Piazza Navona, Campo de' Fiori, Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican Museums. 5-star luxury hotel Rome historic centre: Local inspiration. The boutique Hotel Indigo® Rome - St. George is characterized by an atmosphere full of charm and history. The ancient Renaissance walls surround the contemporary design environments and the modern interiors blend perfectly with important historical testimonies. The large travertine stones on the facade, which come from the Colosseum, recall the shape of modern sofas. The building's Renaissance style and travertine marble walls decorate the lobby, restaurant and bar, all examples of great eras. During the summer season, I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace moves to the panoramic terrace of the hotel, offering a breathtaking view over the roofs and monuments of Rome. Our chef chooses 0 km products and offers tasty "Roman" recipes, preferring products of the season. Treat yourself to some relaxation in the St. George Spa, the hotel's wellness centre, consisting of a sauna, Turkish bath, large whirlpool tub and mini-gym. From this boutique hotel you can discover the delightful shops of Rione Regola.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel Nazionale
description: Set next to Italian Parliament in the famous pedestrian square of Piazza Montecitorio, Hotel Nazionale offers elegant rooms with a flat-screen TV, and free WiFi throughout. The Pantheon is 350 metres away. All rooms here include air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is prepared daily including cheese, cold cuts, pastries and fresh fruit. Gluten-free options are available on request. Hotel Nazionale is set in a renovated building of the 18th century, within walking distance of the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The imposing Pantheon is just around the corner. Piazza Navona and the Trevi Fountain are both within 500 metres of the property. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hassler Roma
description: Set at the top of the Spanish Steps, Hassler Roma is one of the city's most famous hotels. It offers elegant rooms and suites with high-speed free WiFi, and free wellness facilities including a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. Its restaurant and gym have panoramic views over Rome's rooftops. Dining options at the Hassler include the Michelin-starred Imàgo on the 6th floor, the stylish Salone Eva, and the Palm Court restaurant with its ancient stone walls. The cuisine is classic Italian, with international specialities. Rooms at the Hassler feature a satellite TV and air conditioning. All units are classically furnished and some have a large seating area with a sofa. The Hassler is a 5-minute walk from Spagna Metro, while chic Via dei Condotti is just 170 metres away. The hotel's free electric shuttle takes guests to shops in the surrounding area.

name: Hotel Castellino Roma
description: Set just next to Piazza Venezia, in the very centre of Rome, great value Hotel Castellino Roma offers the perfect location for exploring all the city’s sights. The hotel features free WiFi throughout and modern-style rooms. Each room at the Piazza Venezia hotel is decorated with works of modern art, and includes a satellite flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with hairdryer, slippers and toiletries. Some rooms have views of Piazza Venezia square, while suites have a spa bath. An American buffet-style breakfast is provided daily in the dedicated breakfast room. With the Roman Forum on one side, just a 5-minute walk away and the Trevi Fountain on the other, you couldn’t be better placed. Fashion and shopping streets are just a few steps away and of course, right opposite the hotel you have the huge Vittorio Emanuele II monument.

name: Leon's Place Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa, Leon's Place Hotel In Rome is one of the most exclusive design hotels in Italy's capital city, located a 10-minute walk from Villa Borghese park and the famous Via Veneto. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms offer luxury furnishings and a marble bathroom. Many rooms have a beautiful view of the historic centre. A varied breakfast is served daily. Set in a historic building, Leon’s Place is in Rome’s business district, close to the main embassies and government buildings. Public buses are available in nearby Porta Pia, and provide links to Termini Train Station in about 10 minutes. The hotel features a free fitness centre and the Visionnaire Cafè, where you can enjoy drinks in a glamorous setting.

name: Hotel Diocleziano
description: Offering a free gym with sauna, Hotel Diocleziano is opposite Termini Train Station and next to the Terme di Diocleziano ancient Roman baths. Its elegant rooms feature a free Wi-Fi and a paid mini bar. Rooms here have a classic design with carpeted floors. Each one is air conditioned and includes tea and coffee-making. You will also have a digital safe and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Snacks are not available at the bar. The Diocleziano Hotel is set in a 19th-century building in the heart of Rome. Staff can offer tourist information, book museum tickets and arrange massages. There is also a free internet point. A varied hot and cold buffet is served for breakfast and includes fresh fruit, cold cuts, and cakes. Snacks and drinks are available from the bar, which is open until 23:30. Being so close to Termini means you have excellent transport links around Rome and to both international airports. The Coliseum and Trevi Fountain are 2 metro stops away.

name: Etruria Relais And Wine
description: No description found

name: Colonna Suite del Corso
description: No description found

name: Grand Hotel Palace
description: Located on Rome's Via Veneto opposite the American Embassy, this luxury hotel dates back to the 1920s. With free WiFi throughout, this property offers rooms with designer furnishings, an à la carte restaurant, and a free spa. Villa Borghese is 400 metres away. All air conditioned, rooms at the Grand Hotel Palace include an LCD satellite TV and a minibar. The marble bathroom includes VIP toiletries. Guests can enjoy fine Italian cuisine at the Cadorin Restaurant. Breakfast is an extensive American buffet with sweet and savoury options. After a day out, guests can unwind at the wellness centre which includes a sauna and a hot tub. Massages can be reserved, and a fitness centre is also available. The building, designed by Marcello Piacentini, was stylishly restored by Italo Rota. The Cadorin grand hall, and the ultra-modern business lounge with bar, are ideal for relaxation. The hotel is 5 minutes' walk from Piazza Barberini and Barberini Metro Station, on line A. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Kolbe Hotel Rome
description: Overlooking the Palatine Hill, Kolbe Hotel Rome combines medieval arches, exposed brickwork and a courtyard restaurant. It has an enviable location in the heart of historic Rome. Medieval interiors mix with contemporary furnishings such as the leather couches and plasma-screen TVs in the hotel lobby. Some rooms have exposed brick walls and high arched ceilings from the 15th century. The also include air conditioning, satellite TV and Wi-Fi access. A varied hot and cold buffet is available at breakfast. The Unique Al Palatino Garden Restaurant serves Roman and Italian dishes, which can be enjoyed on the patio overlooking the garden. Located next to a Franciscan friary, Kolbe Hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Coliseum and the popular area of Trastevere, just across the Tiber River. The hotel is very well connected by both tourist and local buses.

name: Bettoja Hotel Mediterraneo
description: Designed by Art Deco Architect Mario Loreti in 1938, it sits on top of Esquilino Hill, the highest of Romes Seven Hills, offering unparalleled views of Rome. Inspired by the name Mediterraneo, the marine theme can be enjoyed throughout its 50 meters high 10 floors and 242 rooms. With its central location, a few steps from Roma Termini train station, guests staying at Hotel Mediterraneo can walk to all of the most iconic monuments and attractions of the Ethernal City.iHotelier/iStay
